Task.Name: Frends.Radon.SimpleTask.RadonSimpleTask - Version: 2.2.0.0
Task.ArgumentSchema: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:element name="ARGS"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element default="{CP://filterString}" name="filter_filterString" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://maxTimespan}" name="filter_maxTimespan" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://username}" name="conf_username" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://useWindowsCredentials}" name="conf_useWindowsCredentials" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://subject}" name="conf_subject" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://smtpServerName}" name="conf_smtpServerName" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://senderName}" name="conf_senderName" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://senderAddress}" name="conf_senderAddress" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://recipients}" name="conf_recipients" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://portNumber}" name="conf_portNumber" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://password}" name="conf_password" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://maxIdleTime}" name="conf_maxIdleTime" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://templateFile}" name="conf_templateFile" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://maxMessages}" name="filter_maxMessages" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://remoteMachine}" name="filter_remoteMachine" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://eventLogName}" name="filter_eventLogName" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://useSsl}" name="conf_useSsl" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="EventLog" name="filter_eventSource" type="xs:string" /><xs:element name="filter_externalEventsXml" type="xs:string" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema>

Schema.Name: FRENDSRadon-CPSchema.xsd
Schema.XmlContent:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" version="2.2" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="RadonParameters">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="Filter">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="filterString" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="maxTimespan" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="maxMessages" type="xs:int" />
              <xs:element name="remoteMachine" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="eventLogName" type="xs:string" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="Config">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="smtpServerName" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="portNumber" type="xs:int" />
              <xs:element name="subject" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="senderName" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="senderAddress" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="recipients" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="useWindowsCredentials">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="True" />
                    <xs:enumeration value="False" />
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="username" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="maxIdleTime" type="xs:int" />
              <xs:element name="templateFile" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="useSsl">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="True" />
                    <xs:enumeration value="False" />
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Element.Name: Frends.Radon.SimpleTask.Mailer - Version: 2.2.0.0
Element.ArgumentSchema: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:element name="ARGS"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element default="{CP://username}" name="Username" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://useWindowsCredentials}" name="UseWindowsCredentials" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://subject}" name="Subject" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://smtpServerName}" name="SmtpServerName" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://senderName}" name="SenderName" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://senderAddress}" name="SenderAddress" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://recipients}" name="Recipients" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://portNumber}" name="PortNumber" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://password}" name="Password" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://maxIdleTime}" name="MaxIdleTime" type="xs:string" /><xs:element default="{CP://useSsl}" name="UseSsl" type="xs:string" /><xs:element name="MessageContent" type="xs:string" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema>
